channel.title: Range and requirements help please?
channel.description:
I got lots of questions today...
How do I make it so arrows get used up?
Also, how do I add requirements to items?
And, how do I make it so when you attack with a bow, it adds to range exp?
I swear, I feel like an idiot for asking these kinds of questions.
Thanks.
